mapper.select:
select id,username,nick_name, password,status,email, phonenumber,sex,avatar, user_type,create_by,create_time, update_by,update_time,del_flag, tel_weixin,info,weixin_code from sys_user
and username like % #{username} % and sex like % #{sex} % and phonenumber like % #{phoneNumber} %

SELECT su.id as 'id', su.username as 'username', cof.role_name as 'dep_name', su.station as'station', ext.visitor_total as 'visitor_num', ext.client_total_num as 'client_num', SUM(exs.day_notes_num) as'note_num', SUM(exs.day_download_num) as 'save_card_num', SUM(exs.day_add_contact) as 'save_contact_num', ext.active_num AS'active_num' , ext.stay_num as'stay_num' , ext.average_stay_min as 'average_stay_min', su.create_time as 'create_time', su.create_by as'create_by' FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN exposure_total ext on ext.create_by = su.id LEFT JOIN expo_snapshot exs on exs.expo_total_id = ext.id LEFT JOIN company_frame cof on cof.id=su.dep_id WHERE su.companyid = #{companyid} AND su.del_flag = 0

SELECT su.id as 'id', su.username as 'username', cof.role_name as 'dep_name', su.station as'station', ext.visitor_total as 'visitor_num', ext.client_total_num as 'client_num', SUM(exs.day_notes_num) as'note_num', SUM(exs.day_download_num) as 'save_card_num', SUM(exs.day_add_contact) as 'save_contact_num', ext.active_num AS'active_num' , ext.stay_num as'stay_num' , ext.average_stay_min as 'average_stay_min', su.create_time as 'create_time', su.create_by as'create_by' FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN exposure_total ext on ext.create_by = su.id LEFT JOIN expo_snapshot exs on exs.expo_total_id = ext.id LEFT JOIN company_frame cof on cof.id=su.dep_id WHERE su.companyid = #{companyid} AND su.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY su.id LIMIT #{pageNum} , #{pageSize}

SELECT su.id, su.username, su.phonenumber, su.create_time, sr.`name` AS role_name, u.username AS create_user FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = su.create_by WHERE su.companyid = #{companyid} AND su.user_type = 0 And su.del_flag = 0
